title: #579 - Nic Gregoriades
description:
Nic Gregoriades, the first Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Black belt under Roger Gracie the Host of "The Jiu Jitsu Brotherhood" podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:
  
FujiSports.com  - Use promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount on all the best jiu jitsu and martial arts gear.
 
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a discount at checkout.
  
Recorded live on 04/25/2018.
